short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically favorites any image you vote for

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a simple app to allow you to favorite and select your winning choice by pressing 1-4. You can also select to download all four large sized images at once.
